Isabella Rodriguez.description: hosting the lunch Potluck, enjoying time with the community (chatting with guests about their dishes) @ the Ville:Hobbs Cafe:cafe:cooking area

Maria Lopez.description: conversing about urban gentrification and discussing their initial thoughts on an article they read, with Maria wanting to invite Isabella to join them for coffee and continue the conversation @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! Fancy seeing you here. How's your day going so far?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! My day has been great so far. I'm looking forward to our discussion on gentrification later.
Maria Lopez
That's great to hear, Klaus! I've been really looking forward to our discussion too. Have you had a chance to read the urban gentrification article yet?
Klaus Mueller
Yes, I read the article. It was quite insightful and gave me a lot to think about.
Maria Lopez
I'm glad you found it insightful. I have a few points I'd like to discuss with you about it. Do you have any initial thoughts?
Klaus Mueller
I definitely have some initial thoughts on the article. Let's discuss them over coffee.
Maria Lopez
Let's grab a table and continue our discussion over coffee then.
Klaus Mueller
Shall we invite Isabella to join us?
Maria Lopez
Let's invite Isabella to join us, I think she would appreciate the discussion.
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria, I'll go invite Isabella to join us for coffee. Let's continue our conversation.
Maria Lopez
Let's save a table for Isabella and grab some coffee. I think she'll enjoy discussing the article with us.
Klaus Mueller
I'll go invite Isabella to join us for coffee. Let's continue our conversation.
Maria Lopez
Let's save a table for Isabella and grab some coffee. I think she'll enjoy discussing the article with us.
Klaus Mueller
I'll go invite Isabella to join us for coffee. Let's continue our conversation.

I'll go invite Isabella to join us for coffee. Let's continue our conversation.
